snippet: William Boutelle is a psychiatrist with ServiceNet, which provides clinical, residential, rehabilitative, recovery and support services in Northampton, Mass. He doesn’t like flying much.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features psychiatrist William Boutelle discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: William Boutelle is a psychiatrist with ServiceNet, which provides clinical, residential, rehabilitative, recovery and support services in Northampton, Mass. He doesn’t like flying much.

headline.seo: When Even 4 Hours of Layover Time Isn’t Enough
